entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • gcenv.interlocked's Interlocked use full memory barriers even with 8.1 Atomics #67824
  • Windows arm64 Tests failing on DDARM64-132 #67821
  • Assertion failed in System.Text.Json.JsonSerializer.LookupProperty #67816

Closed

  • Tweak profiler error messages to remove mention of COM #67664
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.ServiceProcess.Tests.ServiceBaseTests.TestOnPauseThenStop #49404
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Enhance RequiresDynamicCode Attribute to apply to class #67368
    7.0.0
  • Consider removing apiset files from self-contained apps #65758
  • The !name2ee command of SOS doesn't work in .Net 6 #67791

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: fix bug where a gc struct is not zero initialized #67825
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add C instrumentation to native libs (Native PGO) #67820

Merged

  • Remove COM from profiler messages #67774
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • BlockingCollection<T>.Take method, XML documentation corrections #67812
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Delete dead code #67648
    area-Meta, 7.0.0
  • Delete dummy ==++== file headers #67823
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Remove dead strings from .rc files #67817
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Use CRT implementation of memset/memcpy #67788
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Delete some Win9x-specific code and comments #67814
    area-VM-coreclr

Updated

  • Adding Regex.EnumerateMatches #67794
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [API Implementation]: Add Microseconds and Nanoseconds to TimeStamp, DateTime, DateTimeOffset, and TimeOnly #67666
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Refactor call argument representation #67238
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Added test for extracting zip files with invalid characters in Windows #67332
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • S.S.C.Cose: Add Async Stream-based signatures #67786
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Retry publish crossgen as AOT (#65948) #67636
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [Mono] Fix uninitialized vtable bug #67746
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Adding missing SDK assets for Publish #67765
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • hostpolicy: As a fallback, try to resolve mangled stdcall symbols on win-x86. #67813
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Faster IndexOf for arm64 #67811
    area-System.Memory
  • Double the size of the previous segment #66930
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • Recursive validation #67810
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, community-contribution
  • Regex.Tests: Disable test that tries to blow the stack, on AOT #67175
    arch-wasm, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
